description:
Timoni is a package manager for Kubernetes, powered by CUE and inspired by Helm.


Timoni's CUE engine has been updated from v0.8.1 to v0.9.2.
To support the development of Timoni going forward please consider becoming a sponsor on GitHub.What's Changed
- Doc typo fix by @falstaff1288 in #396
- Refactor cmd/timoni and extract reconciler logic to dedicated package by @errordeveloper in #366
- Update cuelang.org/go to v0.9.1 by @myitcv in #401
- Post-refactoring cleanup by @errordeveloper in #404
- build(deps): bump the ci group with 3 updates by @dependabot in #402
- Add language version to all modules by @stefanprodan in #407
- Update dependencies to Kubernetes v1.30.2 by @stefanprodan in #408
New Contributors
- @falstaff1288 made their first contribution in #396
- @myitcv made their first contribution in #401
Full Changelog: https://github.com/stefanprodan/timoni/compare/v0.21.0...v0.22.0
